mdRecord.dcterms:title: Return Addresses: Songs and Dances from Home
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Production poster for Return Addresses: Songs and Dances from Home, an enchanting tapestry of songs and rhythmic dances that explore 'home', imagined and directed by Ann Kilkelly. With Guest Performers: Mike Casey, Joan Cope, Carol Crawford Smith, Stephanie Johnston, Malke Rosenfeld, Rob Stephens, Elise Witt, and a cast of 40 singers, dancers and artists.
mdRecord.dcterms:contributor: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. School of the Arts; Lyric Theatre (Blacksburg, Va.); Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. Theatre Arts - University Theatre; Consortium for the Study of Theatre and Community (sponsor)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
